snippet: Jason Bay, who was batting fifth in the Mets’ lineup for their game Wednesday against Tampa Bay, started the day mired in an 0-for-16 slump that began the day he was activated from the disabled list.
abstract: Jason Bay, who was batting fifth in the Mets’ lineup for their game Wednesday against Tampa Bay, started the day mired in an 0-for-16 slump that began the day he was activated from the disabled list.

headline.main: With Bay's Struggles Come Tough Decisions About Playing Time
